Package info.metopt.approx.gradient

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    GradientMethod
    Interface extending this interface Method for multidimensional functions from Vector to Double.
    Matrix
    Algebraic two-dimensional matrix of Double interface
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AbstractGradientMethod
    Abstract class for GradientMethod.
    ConjugateGradientMethod
    Implementation of the GradientMethod interface based on the the conjugate gradient method.
    DiagonalMatrix
    Implementation of the matrix interface for a diagonal matrix.
    GradientDescentMethod
    Implementation of the GradientMethod interface based on the gradient descent method.
    RegularMatrix
    Implementation of a Matrix interface that stores values in full form.
    SteepestDescentMethod
    Implementation of the GradientMethod interface based on the steepest descent method.
    Vector
    Algebraic vector of Double
